issue.title: [Go][CSV] Add arrow.TimestampType support to the reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16504](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16504). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is already a helper to convert strings to arrow.Timestamp so incorporate this into the CSV reader.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16504?focusedCommentId=17537243) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13098
